critique: The executive order seems to be a formal document delegating authority and outlining fund transfers. It doesn't seem designed to evoke strong emotions. However, depending on one's political views and understanding of the historical context (Nicaraguan Democratic Resistance), it could potentially evoke slight feelings of joy (if one supports the cause) or disgust/anger (if one opposes it). Surprise and fear are unlikely. Sadness is also unlikely, but perhaps a very mild sense of sadness could be present if one views the situation as a negative development. I will start with initial scores of joy: 2, disgust: 1, sadness: 1, and revise them after further consideration.
